## goup-util workspace check

Check if a module is in the workspace

### Synopsis

Check if a specific module is included in the Go workspace.

Returns exit code 0 if the module is in the workspace, 1 if not.

```
goup-util workspace check <module-path> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for check
```
